amendment.description: To extend the availability of funds for the Four Corners Interpretive Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 218 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 218 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1432) To extend the availability of funds for the Four Corners Interpretive Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 218 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 218 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Hatch.
